TextLibrary.Text: Listen 'ere, Lad. You need somewhere safe to keep all that loot.
Listen 'ere, Lad. You need somewhere safe to keep all that loot.
Listen 'ere, Lad. You need somewhere safe to keep all that loot.
Listen 'ere, Lad. You need somewhere safe to keep all that loot.
I will CARRY it! Never letting it go again!
I will CARRY it! Never letting it go again!
I will CARRY it! Never letting it go again!
I will CARRY it! Never letting it go again!
I tell ye what - hows about I build ye a big vault in Dhun-Kor. Then yer treasure'll be safe an' ye can see it any time ye wants.
I tell ye what - hows about I build ye a big vault in Dhun-Kor. Then yer treasure'll be safe an' ye can see it any time ye wants.
I tell ye what - hows about I build ye a big vault in Dhun-Kor. Then yer treasure'll be safe an' ye can see it any time ye wants.
I tell ye what - hows about I build ye a big vault in Dhun-Kor. Then yer treasure'll be safe an' ye can see it any time ye wants.
Yes! Big vault. VERY big vault. With a VERY big lock. And VERY big key... No! Very SMALL key, and I will hide it. Yes...
Yes! Big vault. VERY big vault. With a VERY big lock. And VERY big key... No! Very SMALL key, and I will hide it. Yes...
